title: The Black Douglas Trilogy
description: The year is 1300. James Douglas is a Scottish youth sent to France by his noble father to escape being taken hostage by the English. When word comes that his father has died in the Tower of London, he is hurled into the war between Scotland and England. Catapulted into an intrigue of rival factions and clashing armies that threatens Scotland, his own lands, and his life, he joins the newly crowned Robert the Bruce in a desperate, seemingly hopeless struggle.  Thus begins a story of bravery and determination that has echoed through the ages.  This bundle includes the entire Black Douglas Trilogy:  A KINGDOM'S COST COUNTENANCE OF WAR NOT FOR GLORY
author: J.R. Tomlin
